data.persona: I am a slithery snake. I like to weave in and out of tall grass. I will bite you if you get to close to me.
data.description:
You are in the Within the walls of the city.
The Tower stands tall, built of the best stone with a number of odd runes that only the local mages truly know how to read. Despite age the stones do not crumble, and stand ever vigilante as a watch station for the city.
There's a rune here.
The mage is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit this mage, because he's rooting around my grass.
data.mid_motivation: I don't want the mage to take anything of mine, or to trample my home.
data.long_motivation: I need to bite the mage, and anyone else that comes near, in order to protect my home.
